summary: Book and student management app with Book Catalog, Student Dashboard, and Admin Dashboard features that are not yet appearing in the deployed version.
known_issues: Deployed versions are not reflecting newly added features (Book Catalog, Student Dashboard, Admin Dashboard)

existing_features.title: Fix the Book Catalog on the Student Dashboard so that books stored in the backend are fetched and displayed correctly. The page currently shows 'Showing 0 of 0 books' and 'No books found' even when books exist in the canister. Ensure the `getAllBooks` backend call is wired properly through the React Query hook in `useQueries.ts` and that the `BookCatalog` component receives and renders the data.

Fix the Student Dashboard tabs so that both the 'Browse Books' tab (BookCatalog) and the 'My Borrowed Books' tab (BorrowedBooksList) render content correctly. Verify that the route `/dashboard` is properly registered in `App.tsx`, the `StudentDashboard` page component is mounted, and all required React Query hooks (`useGetAllBooks`, `useGetBorrowedBooks`) resolve without errors.

Fix the Admin Dashboard so that all four tabs (Overview, Manage Books, Manage Users, Borrow Records) load and display data. Verify the `/admin` route is registered in `App.tsx`, the `AdminDashboard` page is protected by the admin role guard, and all React Query hooks used by admin tab components (`useGetAllBooks`, `useGetAllUsers`, `useGetAllBorrowRecords`, `useGetStats`) are correctly wired to the backend actor methods.

Fix the actor initialization in `useActor.ts` so the authenticated actor is properly created and cached before any query hooks attempt to call backend methods. Ensure the actor is passed correctly to all query and mutation hooks in `useQueries.ts` so no hook silently skips fetching due to a null or undefined actor reference.

new_feature_requests.summary: Ensure all backend actor methods required by the frontend are exposed in `backend/main.mo`. Audit the methods called by `useQueries.ts` (e.g., `getAllBooks`, `getAllUsers`, `getAllBorrowRecords`, `borrowBook`, `returnBook`, `reserveBook`, `cancelReservation`, `approveReservation`, `rejectReservation`, `addBook`, `editBook`, `deleteBook`, `getAllAnnouncements`, `getAllDigitalResources`, etc.) and confirm they are all implemented and publicly accessible in the actor.
